lead_paragraph: Our college admissions mania has turned empathy into an extracurricular activity.

headline.print_headline: To Get to Harvard, Go to Haiti?
headline.main: To Get to Harvard, Go to Haiti?

snippet: Our college admissions mania has turned empathy into an extracurricular activity....
abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column calls attention to how frequently American high school students, particularly affluent ones, will make show of doing volunteer work in poor countries in order to burnish their college applications; acknowledges many high schools now require students to complete community service projects, but questions why so many students choose to do brief stint overseas rather than looking for opportunities to serve needy communities at home over sustained period.
